title: action
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

act.description: The action performed by the account.

acct.description: The web account associated with the action.

acct:site.description: The site or service associated with the account.

acct:user.description: The unique identifier for the account.

time.description: The date and time the account performed the action.

client.description: The source client address of the action.

client:ipv4.description: The source IPv4 address of the action.

client:ipv6.description: The source IPv6 address of the action.

loc.description: The location of the user executing the web action.

latlong.description: The latlong of the user when executing the web action.

place.description: The geo:place of the user when executing the web action.
